attributes.action: Make sanitary products free for all females across the United Kingdom
attributes.additional_details: Sanitary products are considered a “luxury item” and therefore have to be paid for. The menstrual cycle is not a “luxury” experience for any female at any age. We shouldn’t have to pay for a product that is vital to a females well-being.
attributes.background: End period poverty and support girls and women who can’t afford sanitary products by making them free.

rejection.details:
You might like to sign the following petition:

Fund free female sanitary products, such as sanitary towels and tampons
https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/555551
